name: Stale Lead Alert - Daily Check
description: Every morning, finds leads that have been sitting without activity for 7+ days and alerts Ana via Slack.

flow.note: Find leads in active Ana statuses with Last Contact Date older than 7 days
Only proceed if there are stale leads
Aggregate all stale leads into one message

flow.note: Send Slack message listing all stale leads

setup_instructions.step_2: Replace YOUR_BOARD_ID with your Monday board ID
setup_instructions.step_3: Configure Slack connection and channel (Ana's DM or team channel)
setup_instructions.step_5: Test by temporarily changing the date filter to 1 day

stale_criteria.why: These are active Ana statuses where momentum matters. 7+ days of silence = lead going cold.

what_ana_should_do.option_1: Follow up immediately - call or SMS
what_ana_should_do.option_2: If they've been unresponsive for 14+ days, consider Hibernation
what_ana_should_do.option_3: Check Notes for context - did they say they'd be busy?
